Intro.Title: Era V: Age of Empires
Intro.Text: Your empires have gained a foothold and perhaps even expanded onto neighboring islands. Now itâ€™s time to flex their might and expand, or perhaps fight, their way across the seas.

5.1.Title: 5.1 Worldwide Expansion
5.1.Text: All results can now be placed in any region on the map. Roll 6 times in this Era for 60 years of advancement, using the Growing Empires Table below and recording the results.

5.2.Title: 5.2 Neighbors Develop
5.2.Text: Each player will take turns rolling on the appropriate table for every non-prime faction in their home region.  Roll once for each neighbor
